long_description: Kick back and relax at the campground with the smooth rocking motion of the GCI Freestyle Rocker(TM) chair. Shocks in back provide a smooth and relaxing rocking motion on hard or soft ground. Powder-coated steel frame supports up to 250 lbs. Includes padded armrests for good comfort. Pocket on the side keeps a beverage within reach. GCI Freestyle Rocker(TM) chair folds down quickly and easily for transporting to and from the campsite.
short_description: Kick back and relax at the campground with the smooth rocking motion of the GCI Freestyle Rocker(TM) chair.
